article_title: Lib Dem MP says British government not being listened to by Israel.
sentence: He  adds  that  Hamas  terrorists  sought  to  provoke  an  "excessive  response",  which  in  turn  will  provoke  future  retribution  as  another  Palestinian  generation  mourns  its  dead  and  is  attracted  to  the  very  Islamism  that  Israel  is  trying  to  destroy  along  with  Hamas.
